languages.text: {n}Требуется время, чтобы выбить из куска мяса, звавшегося Фроше, ответы. Где-то между хлюпающими ударами и треском ломающихся костей вам удается вырвать из его уст несколько слов: "Врата Септента. Пространственные врата".{/n}

{n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Требуется время, чтобы выбить из куска мяса, звавшегося Фроше, ответы. Где-то между хлюпающими ударами и треском ломающихся костей вам удается вырвать из его уст несколько слов: "Врата Септента. Пространственные врата".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: {n}Reducing Froscher to a barely human lump of pounded meat takes time. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}你花了很长时间，才将弗罗舍捶成了一坨肉泥。在殴打声与骨头的断裂声中，你终于从他的嘴里逼出了几个字。“塞普坦之港，次元门。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你花了很长时间，才将弗罗舍捶成了一坨肉泥。在殴打声与骨头的断裂声中，你终于从他的嘴里逼出了几个字。“塞普坦之港，次元门。”{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}かつてフロッシャーと名乗った肉の塊から答えを引き出すには時間がかかる。だが、ある瞬間、打撃音と折れた骨が砕ける音の間に、彼の口からいくつかの言葉が出てきた。「ポルタ・セプテンタム。超次元の門」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}かつてフロッシャーと名乗った肉の塊から答えを引き出すには時間がかかる。だが、ある瞬間、打撃音と折れた骨が砕ける音の間に、彼の口からいくつかの言葉が出てきた。「ポルタ・セプテンタム。超次元の門」{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Tardas un buen rato en arrancarle respuestas a golpes al despojo humano que se llamaba Froscher. En algún momento, entre los sonidos de tus golpes y el crujido de los huesos rotos, consigues sacarle varias palabras. «Porta Septentum. Portal dimensional».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tardas un buen rato en arrancarle respuestas a golpes al despojo humano que se llamaba Froscher. En algún momento, entre los sonidos de tus golpes y el crujido de los huesos rotos, consigues sacarle varias palabras. «Porta Septentum. Portal dimensional».{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Es dauert eine Weile, Antworten aus dem Stück Fleisch herauszuprügeln, das sich einmal Froscher nannte. Irgendwann, zwischen den klatschenden Geräuschen deiner Schläge und dem Knacken gebrochener Knochen, gelingt es dir, ihm einige Worte zu entlocken. "Porta Septentum. Dimensionstor."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es dauert, Froscher zu einem kaum noch als Mensch erkennbaren Haufen Fleisch zu klopfen. Irgendwann, zwischen den klatschenden Geräuschen deiner Schläge und dem Knacken gebrochener Knochen, gelingt es dir, ein paar Worte aus seinem Mund zu bekommen. "Porta Septentum. Dimensionstor."{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Vous rouez de coups le tas de chair qui se faisait autrefois appeler Froscher pendant ce qui vous semble une éternité. Au bout d'un moment, entre les affreux bruits de succion de vos coups et le craquement des os qui se brisent, il laisse échapper quelques mots : « Porta Septentum. Portail dimensionnel. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous rouez de coups le tas de chair qui se faisait autrefois appeler Froscher pendant ce qui vous semble une éternité. Au bout d'un moment, entre les affreux bruits de succion de vos coups et le craquement des os qui se brisent, il laisse échapper quelques mots : « Porta Septentum. Portail dimensionnel. »{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Bir zamanlar adına Froscher diyen bu et yığınından cevapları sökmek zaman alıyor. Darbelerinin ve kırılan kemiklerin sesleri arasında bir yerde ağzından birkaç kelime çıkarmayı başarıyorsun: "Porta Septentum. Boyutsal geçit."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time to beat answers out of the lump of meat that once called itself Froscher. At some point, between the squelching sounds of your blows and the cracking of broken bones, you manage to force several words out of his mouth. "Porta Septentum. Dimensional gate."{/n}
